Articles.Content:
![qpBvibz.png](http://i.imgur.com/qpBvibz.png)
Flag courtesy of [KOSMOS Space Station Parts](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24970-0-21-Kosmos-Spacecraft-Design-Bureau-Updated-%289-27-13%29)

[@Krussia\_SA](https://twitter.com/Krussian_SA)

^Twitter Account to follow and keep up to date on our advancements^

ÃÂ¢ÃÂ°ÃÂ¼, fellow komrades! Welcome to the beginning of a new era for all kerbalkind. We, Krussia Space And Flight Agency (KSAFA), consist of many "private" companies, but we are mostly funded by the wonderful Krussian government. KSAFA started out in 2014 as a simple idea, consisting of 4 kerbals at the time. Sergey Kerman was the leader of the group. Yuri Kerman was muscle and one who put words into actions. Valentin Kerman was the engineer, while Mikhail Kerman was the designer. Now the program, thanks to extra funding in the effort to fight Kapitalism, has grew up to 57 kerbals, with thousands of supporters. Explore the solar system with us! We promise that we are much different from [those of the KSA](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82506-The-Kerbal-Space-Agency-Mission-Dispatch-54-Back-In-Bizness-ComSat-Minmus-I), we will be better.

IMAGES

![OFsGYOe.png](http://i.imgur.com/OFsGYOe.png)

> 
>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-22T18:47:07Z" title="02/22/2015 06:47  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 22, 2015</time> by Creeping**

The historic flight of Kaputnik 1 was a success! Thousands gathered to watch the launch! However, at T+1:40, when the boosters separated, they flew right back into the main body. Damage was done to the body, but we still managed to keep control of the ship and put it into a suborbital position (as intended). The first images of Kerbin were taken! 

> 
> ![OFsGYOe.png](http://i.imgur.com/OFsGYOe.png)
> 
>

Kaputnik 2 successfully reached orbit! Kaputnik 2's main objective was to collect important solar data so we can make solar panels larger, more efficient, and weigh less. There were also extra instruments added to test the temperature and gravity effects of space.

> 
> ![iB8SxB8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/iB8SxB8.jpg)
> 
>

Chapter 3 - Vishtik 1

After the flight of Kaputnik 2, the KSAFA decided that it is time to send the first Kerbal into space. Yuri Kerman stepped up to the position and soon became the first kerbal to enter space. However, the engineers forgot to limit the thrust on the eight SRB's that lined the ship on it's launch. Yuri experienced up to 12 Gees and is currently in the hospital for checkups to make sure that he is okay. The next mission will help tremendously with future missions...

> ![9we4jrd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9we4jrd.jpg)
>
